entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
